name: openai-teaching-package
description: A comprehensive TypeScript package for AI crew orchestration with OpenAI API

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/ninja-agents && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:generate --workspace=packages/ninja-agents && npm run docs:json --workspace=packages/ninja-agents && rm -rf web/public/agents_docs && mv packages/ninja-agents/docs web/public/agents_docs
